Entry.JapaneseText: まさか、あのマウロが 海賊王アイフリードの子孫とはな。
Entry.EnglishText: To think that Mauro is a descendant of the Pirate King Aifread.

Entry.JapaneseText: アイフリードってどんな人？
Entry.EnglishText: What kind of person was Aifread?

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギアの北の海一帯を 縄張りにしていた義賊だ。
Entry.EnglishText: He was a chivalrous thief who made Callegea's northern sea his domain.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……盗んだものを貧しい人々に 分け与えていたんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... He would give whatever he had stolen to the poor.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、最後は愛する者を守るために 壮絶な死を遂げたらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: However, it is said that in the end, he laid down his life to protect the ones he loved.

Entry.JapaneseText: くううぅぅッ！ それでこそ、男の中の男だぜ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Whew! Sounds like he was a real man amongst men!
